website_summaries.verdict: Simple solid colored tote diaper bag that's made for travel with a strong construction quality.
pros: Includes 13 separate pockets that you can secure shut so you can organize everything you need
Two large inner compartments can hold all of your gear
Insulated bottle carrier keeps milk cold
Includes stroller clips that are removable
cons: Kind of a boring design with a solid color only

customer_reviews.title: So much love for this
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this bag, the space and compartments are perfect. I can keep baby, kid, and my things organized!! They material is beautiful and super soft. Plus it comes with so many extras. The clutch is super appreciated!! I wish you guys made a convertible backpack, that's literally the only thing I could ask for, since I wear baby a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha M

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag
customer_reviews.text: BEST customer service out there! I've been using the bag for about 8 weeks now. I like that it can be worn as a messenger bag. Though the strap has already worn down the material and is showing the material under the "leather" looking coating. I wish it had a sturdy boning separating the two compartments. Decent bag overall.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsball1

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Big enough to keep my newborn thing and my toddler things in separate compartments. Even with the outfits, diapers/pull-ups, wipes, exc. It doesn't feel nor look bulky. It looks like a small travel bag or purse. Nicely made and love the space and pockets. Good job. So glad I found a bag like this.
customer_reviews.author: LoveLife

customer_reviews.title: looks great and somehow still manages to fit all my babies ...
customer_reviews.text: So impressed! The bag is classy, looks great and somehow still manages to fit all my babies things. I wanted a diaper bag that I could replace my purse with and still be stylish. This is my second bag from Isoki and they really have great quality products!
customer_reviews.author: Chels-jonah

customer_reviews.title: A great bag to fit diapers
customer_reviews.text: A great bag to fit diapers, change of clothes, muslin blanket, wipes on one side and all my stuff (wallet, small zipper bag, snacks, planner...) on the other. It does look like a small duffle bag when filled but I'm happy with the purchase. True to color and the double straps fit over my shoulder. Overall I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love! Is such good quality and even though it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! Is such good quality and even though it’s a satchel it rests very comfortably on shoulder. Lining is nice and light enough to see everything. Plenty of compartments to keep organized. Fits items for both my baby and toddler. And best part it doesn’t look like a diaper bag. It’s a beautiful, any season blue color and material seems like it will hold up well over time. Hopefully it will be easy enough to clean. Nicer than the cheaper skiphop bags I’ve gotten and more functional the more expensive Nordstrom petunia diaper bag I had. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful multi purpose baby bag. I absolutely absolutely love it. Many compartments to divide baby and mommy stuff and big enough for everything you need to go in! The color is great and the quality is definitely top class. I would buy this bag again and again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Fashionista

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag! Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag! Spacious, well organized, soft material, and enough structure on its own that I can open it one handed....which is import in a diaper bag! It had a weird smell when I first opened it, but it aired out quickly enough and is fine now. The bag is the perfect combination of beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.author: NotSure

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife’s for our 4th child plus she will be traveling a lot. I think it’s big enough to fit the baby stuff and maybe a pair for the other kids. She loves everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: RabJani

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is just amazing! It fits everything and it looks fabulous. I started carrying my wallet and phone in the wristlet and only carrying this bag. It's great to not have to lug around a diaper bag and purse. I get tons of compliments on my cute bag and people are often surprised it's a diaper bag. The quality is extraordinary!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Convenient handles and straps and a very useful changing pad
customer_reviews.text: The bag is large enough to hold everything a baby would need. Convenient handles and straps and a very useful changing pad, small purse, and bottle cooler. Good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, beautiful And a good size. So glad I purchased this. I would absolutely recomend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Libby S

customer_reviews.title: the strap broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought it sometime in July as I need to travel international. Having said that, the strap broke in the airport. Am not even reaching my destination yet. I am dissapointed and frustrated. Hoping the seller could do an exchange,
customer_reviews.author: Minalyn Divina

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice while it lasted, which wasn’t long
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is the perfect size and had fit everything I needed for the little one. However, it didn’t last long. The zipper to the main pocket broke just as I arrived on a fun trip for the kids. Disappointed to say the least. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: YESSSSS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bag I've got from Isoki! I'm just as much in love with this one as the first one I ordered!! Wonderful bags that you can't and won't find anywhere else!!!! Great quality, beautiful, & their customer service is outstanding. Do yourself a favor and order ANY of their bags.
customer_reviews.author: Bethanny Troia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!!! Cannot wait to use it. Looks even better in person!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I love it and so did she
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her first baby. I love it and so did she! There is plenty of room and the pockets are great! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: babs

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag and very spacious. Perfect for everything I need for myself and baby. Lovely color and soft to the touch. Would buy this again and recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: IP22

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this purchase! I bought it in blue, and now I want the black one too! It is both stylish and economical, and I don’t need to carry a separate purse. There’s plenty of space for keeping everything all in one place. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: JWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing!!! It literally has a pocket for EVERYTHING!! Plus it doesn’t look like a “diaper bag” which a a great thing, It’s the perfect blend of chic bag and practicality for all your baby needs!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly what I need with good price !
customer_reviews.text: What I really like in this bag is the quality, it looks like a really expensive bag ! And it s very spacious ! U can organize ur stuffs and separate ur baby stuffs ! I’m traveling so I really need it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the space that it has to put all your ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the space that it has to put all your items and babies items. Got this bag to use as a hospital bag and longer outings diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carr & Amber

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m loving it! I have it packed as my hospital bag for now until my little one gets here. It’s got so much room and pockets! It’s super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine R

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is even more gorgeous in person :D love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!! I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely beautiful! I love all the different compartments... And all the extras that come with it! This will be my 5th baby and this bag is by far the BEST I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, lots of compartments
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a girlfriend. I stuffed it with clothes and toys - it held all her gifts! May get one for myself as a work bag!
customer_reviews.author: aggiekitten04

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag with organization/pockets
customer_reviews.text: This bag is absolutely BEAUTIFUL! It not only functions perfectly for a diaper bag, but it also looks like a high end purse!! Exactly what I was looking for and would highly recommend for any mom who wants to have function and style!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has plenty of space without being too large and cumbersome. The material is super soft and the blue color is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Meadows

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. As a diaper bag, it is very sturdy and because it is bigger than the regular diaper bags it holds many stuff inside. Believe me, I have this bag all in one and still more room inside. I do not mine the weight because as long as I don’t not have to carry extra bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter who is having her second baby. It is good quality and it's nice you can wash down the outside because it is not cloth. She loves that it has two compartments because most diaper bags just have one. There's plenty of space for her to pack a days worth of stuff for her two year old and the baby to come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Perfect diaper bag! I love traveling with this diaper bag you can carry anything you need I use one side for diapers and other side for change of clothes or whatever I may need. I want to get one for traveling it's so spacious and stylish it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great diaper bag, love the extra stuff it comes with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Isoki Large Diaper Bag Black Vegan Faux Leather Double Zip Satchel 13 Pockets with Changing Mat Purse and Insulated Bottle Tote
product_meta.description: The super stylish Double Zip Satchel Changing Bag is the perfect bag for Mums who love to have a place for everything! With a total of 13 pockets, it holds everything you need for baby. The 2 main inner compartments have numerous pockets to hold nappies, clothes, toys, wipes and creams. Each section is lined with beautiful bespoke Isoki waterproof fabric and closes with a zipper to keep contents safe. The outside front pocket keeps all of your essentials such as phone, wallet, keys and lipgloss tidy and organised. Other accessories included in this functional bag are a zippered purse to hold your babys soother or your cash, a wipe clean padded change mat and single bottle carrier to keep baby’s milk cool or warm. If total organisation is your mantra, you will love this beautiful nappy bag. Features include : 3 separated compartments Numerous pockets to hold nappies, clothes, toys, wipes and creams. Zippered closure to keep contents safe. Outside front pocket keeps all of your essentials such as phone, wallet, keys and lipgloss tidy and organised. Accessories included: Removable zippered purse, perfect for holding dummies or cash. Large wipe clean padded change mat. Single insulated bottle carrier. Adjustable shoulder strap. Removable stroller clips.
feature_bullets: BIG SPACE – 13 secure pockets. Count them. Double zipper and multi-function storage options. Skip the small backpack totes for your girls and boys.
FUNCTIONAL – Your vegan (plastic) designer leather bag is so easy to clean. Our price includes all accessories for the ultimate kids stuff holder.
USEFUL – Insert your insulated bottle carrier, lunch, diapers and lined padded change pad. Maternity, newborn infant, toddler or all 3? Our bag is big. Everything fits!
CLEVER – Adjustable stylish shoulder strap and removable cute stroller clips. Why carry if it’s heavy?
FASHION SAVVY – Fashionable women love these Australian designed bags at their shower. Our collection is best. They work as sleeping weekender storage bag or everyday nappy bag. Go on - hop onboard!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
